review: Fantastic doctor, 1. Planning and timing is perfect, one the most precise in time 2. Quality time spend with patient 3. Giving complete explanation of the cause & treatment details 4. How the overall treatment & her expertise. I would recommend Dr.Remya as one the best Endodontist .

review: Dr Remya explained the details of the treatment upfront and listened to my dental issues recommending the right solutions to go ahead. Did a great job without much pain and am satisfied very much overall. Supporting staff also did fairly well. I strongly recommend Dr Remya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I'm extremely happy and satisfied with the treatment given at Dr. Jagan's Dental Clinic. Both Dr. Vinutha and Dr. Remya Premkumar were very kind, and explained  why and how the treatment will be given.  It was a pain free process. It's because of the excellent and timely treatment given by them that I was able to go on a short vacation. At the end of the treatment, I was given a detailed report of what's done so far, and what's to be done later, along with the x-rays taken during my treatment, which  will enable me to get treatment in future by dentists in my place of residence. The supportive staff - Mr. Raghu, the dental assistant, and Ms Anitha, the clinic administrator - were also kind, polite, and courteous. The follow ups done by Ms Anitha after every stage of treatment show the care and concern they have for the patients.
Highly recommended. 😊😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Remya is very patient and ethical doctor. She explained the issues clearly and was honest with her treatment. I’ve been going to her many years and what I like about her is that she never prescribes any treatment that is not required for the sake of profit . Some of my  other dentist friends also go to her for treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cleaning,Mouth Guard,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Examinations,Dental Crowns,
review: Dr. Remya Premkumar was very experienced and excellent in examining and curing the dental problems. she used to suggest very appropriate medication/scanning/any other procedures if required. She is very honest and mankind. I am very much satisfied with her treatment for many years and even if any problems I would like to wait and consult with Dr.Remya only. I undergone with various treatments with her like partial fracture  consultation/ removal of fractured teeth / RCA for tooth pain, Root canal treatment, mouth guard, fixing crowns etc. I would recommend 200% for her support and services. Thanks a lot for your service doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words..

And I highly recommend her expert services to all my friends and family in Bangalore.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr. Remya has been an extraordinary dentist, who always walks that extra mile to ensure the patients are treated well and are made fully aware of the whats, whys and how's. She has been treating us, our kids and parents for a while now, and it's appropriate to say that she has been nothing short of amazing. Thanks Dr. Remya for being super supportive and patient with all of us.

Thank you dr. Remya
